name: •  Is being aware of our existential emptiness a form of freedom?  •
description: No, it is a bondage, there is no such thing as freedom as a permanent state. However, there are moments in which one is free. In any case, I think that we are never free, since we are always tied to something, be it a pain or a loss, the vicissitudes of everyday life, etc. Emptiness chains us... perhaps simply because it is a neurosis.
